content.question: Which of the following visual features is intentionally included by artists to help the viewer to link a Ndop (portrait figure) with a specific named individual?

choices.label: A projecting headdress that is placed on the figureâ€™s head
A naturalistic likeness with a unique facial expression
A geometric motif pattern sculpted on the front of the base
A set of royal regalia, such as belts, armbands, and bracelets

content.answer: A geometric motif pattern sculpted on the front of the base

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
